content.rendered:
The website is undergoing a full-fledged remodel project in which every page will at some point be remastered. Certain features being implemented include:

1. Footnotes to prevent extra information from getting in the way.
2. While downloading Rikaikun and/or Yomitan is recommended, furigana will be implemented when I have time to add them.
3. Many new lessons added every year, covering existing and new topics in greater detail.

Lessons that have already been remastered once but are open for user feedback and text revisions are highlighted in light grey. For all other lessons, please refrain from reporting issues, as I have not yet had the chance to get to them thoroughly.

As we are updating and adding more functionality to the side bar, the Table of Contents shown here is the most up-to-date at all times. Please do not report mismatching numbers or titles between this page and the side bar. We know.
